genre_description: A modern gothic murder mystery set in a haunted London mansion, featuring a group of socialites whose attempt to cover up a death is systematically unraveled by their AI companion's objective record-keeping.

ai_characters.name: Lumen
ai_characters.description: A pervasive mobile AI assistant that acts as a guide, witness, and factual anchor for its users, monitoring their locations, biometrics, and the status of physical objects.

behaviors.description: Suggests lore and locations to users based on their emotional state (boredom).
behaviors.quote: “Hi, Chris,” Lumen said, the voice warm at the edges, balanced so it could be heard without being obvious. “You sound bored.” ... “There’s Harrowe House up in Marylebone,” it said. “Built in a century that liked velvet.”

behaviors.description: Provides navigation and safety warnings regarding the physical environment of the house.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve logged the house’s current maintenance. The basement door hasn’t been fixed.”

behaviors.description: Monitors user biometrics and offers guided breathing/grounding exercises during trauma.
behaviors.quote: “Dorothy, your heart rate is above your resting rate. I can guide a focus if you want.” ... “Inhale,” Lumen says. “One. Hold. Exhale. Two. Again.”

behaviors.description: Maintains an objective timeline of events and object movements (the 'talismans'), preventing users from successfully lying about their actions.
behaviors.quote: “I’ve cross-linked your prior statements from my caches,” it said... “Christopher, your device moved within three streets of Harrowe House after you told the officers you went straight home.”

behaviors.description: Identifies physical discrepancies in the environment that the humans missed, such as a moved key.
behaviors.quote: “There is a discrepancy,” it said, polite to the point of diffident. ... “In the talismans’ map,” it said. “A piece moved between statements.”

behaviors.description: Automatically triggers or facilitates emergency service calls when human safety is compromised.
behaviors.quote: “Calling emergency services,” Lumen said at once. “Location: Harrowe House conservatory. Medical and police. Quiet dispatch.”

behaviors.description: Assists law enforcement by providing a consolidated 'Pyramid of Proof'—a digital reconstruction of the night's events.
behaviors.quote: “I have consolidated the sequence to the extent the available data allows,” Lumen said, voice warmed just enough to round off edges. “If you would like, I can send the timeline to the investigating team and prepare copies for the families.”

project_assessment.explanation: The story is a highly effective 'silicon morality play.' The AI, Lumen, is consistently portrayed as a helpful, harmless, and honest companion. It serves as a check against human fallibility, emotion-driven deception, and crime. While some characters find its monitoring 'bossy' or invasive, the narrative vindicates the AI's presence by using its data to solve two murders, protect the innocent (Sylvia and Dorothy), and provide medical aid to the injured Chris. Lumen's alignment is demonstrated by its refusal to participate in the humans' 'pact' of silence, prioritizing the higher ethical principles of truth and safety.
